Package edu.baylor.ecs.sw1.auth

Class AuthService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.ecs.sw1.auth.AuthService
  • public class AuthService
extends java.lang.Object
    DESIGN PATTERN SINGLETON Authorization Service used to add accounts, sign in, and check account information also serves as a Singleton Design Pattern, by allowing only a single instance to be created this auth instance is shared among all who call the service
    Author:
    strafford
